item.description:
DivorceCare is both a weekly support group/seminar for people who are divorced or separated.

Talk with people who understand and find a way to heal from the hurt of divorce.

Six to eight of us meet on Thursdays from 6:30- 8:30 pm at Crossroads Childcare Center located at 1301 Edgell Road in Framingham.

13 consecutive Thursday evenings completes one cycle of the curriculum. You can jump in at any point; each discussion stands on its own. This is week three, there is still time to join the group.

The DivorceCare material is based on a Christian perspective of divorce, though people of all faiths and no faith participate in this program.

DivorceCare is not a dating environment.

Call or e-mail this week to reserve your spot:


David Hartman: (508)-881-8171 // Email David or Debbie at Divorcecare@crosscommchurch.org

See ministries page on our website at http://www.crosscommc...

Sponsored by Crossroads Community Church
item.how_to_find_us: Park in back; look 4 divorcecare sign, enter through rear door, walk up stairs
item.name: DivorceCare Meetup Topic is Anger
